title.narrative: Pakistan Punjab Cities Governance Improvement Project

description.narrative: The project development objectives are to support the Province of Punjab's cities in strengthening systems for improved planning, resource management, and accountability, and to improve the Province of Punjab's capacity to respond promptly and effectively to an Eligible Crises or Emergency.

participating-org.narrative: Planning and Development Board, Government of Punjab
